title: GC Forms Alpha Schema
description: A schema to define a Forms configuration.

securityAttribute.description: It shows an administrator what proceduce should be taken when accessing a form's responses

internalTitleEn.description: The displayed title of the form to the user in English

internalTitleFr.description: The displayed title of the form to the user in French

publishingStatus.description: If set to false, the link to the form will not appear on the main page, rather under 'sandbox'

elements.description: A list of elements contained within the form.

urlEn.description: Url for english version of the site.

urlFr.description: url for a french version of the site.

disableGCBranding.description: If set to true, GC branding will not be rendered in the footer.

email.description: The email address to which the form submission should be sent.

vault.description: If set to true, the form submission will be saved in the vault.

id.description: The unique id for the object

placeholderEn.description: Text that will appear in the text input field as a placeholder in English

placeholderFr.description: Text that will appear in the text input field as a placeholder in French

descriptionEn.description: Secondary paragraph/text of a question or element that provides additional context beyond the label in English

descriptionFr.description: Secondary paragraph/text of a question or element that provides additional context beyond the label in French

maxLegth.description: The maximum number of characters that can be entered in a textinput or textarea.

all.description: Used only for checkboxes, ignored on other elements. When set to true, this will require that all checkboxes be selected. Used typically for the attestation section.
